message: Let's start fair. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor, but I'm open to discussion.
I'll take the smaller share this round, but I'm hoping you'll come back with a better offer next time.
Let's split it down the middle.  We both lose value with every round, so a 50/50 split is the best way to maximize our gains.
I'm still not convinced a 50/50 split is the best we can do. I'll try to do better this time.
